description.message: Extension for the AdGuard desktop app. Manages filtering right from the browser, hides annoying elements in two clicks.

adg_is_not_installed.message: AdGuard is not installed or configured incorrectly

increase_ab_block_quality.message: Increases the quality of ad blocking

reset_custom_rules.message: Remove all user rules for this page

cert_expired.message: AdGuard could not verify this website's certificate because the root certificate has expired

cert_absent.message: HTTPS filtering was not performed for this website

site_not_using_private_protection.message: The site isn't using a secure connection. Someone might be able to see or change the information you send or get through the site.

reload_to_resume_filtering.message: Reload this page to resume filtering

not_filtering_https.message: By default, we don't filter HTTPS traffic for the payment system and bank websites. You can enable the filtering yourself: tap on the yellow "lock" on the left.

filtering_exception.message: Filtering is disabled because it may affect the website's performance.

context_site_filtering_disabled.message: AdGuard cannot run on this domain

post_install_confirm_uninstall.message: Are you sure you want to remove AdGuard Browser Assistant?

post_install_consent_title.message: Thanks for installing AdGuard Browser Assistant!

post_install_consent_short_app_desc.message: This companion browser extension for <link>AdGuard desktop apps</link> offers in-browser access to such features as custom element blocking, allowlisting websites, and submitting reports.

post_install_consent_sent_info_desc.message: Every time you open a new tab, the add-on communicates with the standalone app and requests information about the current page status. In order to do that, it sends the current page's URL to the standalone app.

post_install_consent_policy_urls.message: By installing this add-on, you agree to our <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy> and <terms>Terms of Use</terms>.

post_install_page_title.message: Thanks for installing AdGuard Browser Assistant!

options_context_menu_title.message: Show in the browser context menu
